document_data.name: Goblin Wars
document_data.mainbody: The '''Goblin Wars''' were a series of conflicts fought in the kingdom of [[Erlkazar]] against invading [[goblin]]s in [[1358 DR]].

History.Legacy:
During the conflict, a brewer of [[Llorbauth]], [[Araneth Idogyr]], met and befriended a [[cyclops]], from whom he acquired the recipe for [[Old One Eye]] ale.

Erlkazar and the Shieldbreakers maintained their alliance against the High Peaks goblins and [[giant]]s as of [[1367 DR]].

According to reports, the goblins had just begun to regain their strength a decade later.

Combatants.Casualties: Among the casualties was [[Rysodyl Boughstrong]], the [[elf]] husband of High Watcher [[Laxaella Bronshield]], Baroness of [[Tanistan]]. Rysodyl was killed by King Ertyk Uhl himself.
